document.full_text: the miami heat held off a huge philadelphia rally to beat the 76ers on saturday in game 1, thanks to contributions from chris bosh and lebron james.
document.title: heat 97, 76ers 89: heat get a late scare, top 76ers in game 1
lines_and_colors: the miami heat held off a huge philadelphia rally to beat the 76ers on saturday in game 1, thanks to contributions from chris bosh and lebron james.
